notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: IDRA, JVF and VSA conceived the experimental design; NCA and RMA performed extraction and phytochemical characterization of the essential oil; IDRA and VSA designed and performed the microbial assays; RFAJ, KJSF, ACVAG and RFAJ designed and performed cytotoxicity assays; IDRA, NCA and ACVAG wrote the paper. All authors read and approved the manuscript.
